text:
with AWS Card Clash by 
AWS Skill Builder.

virtual card game
that uses strategic turn based gameplay

to help you learn about AWS
services and solution design.
No prior AWS experience is required.

You can jump in quickly
and start playing against an AI competitor

that will test your AWS solution
knowledge.

Choose from different architectures,
then deploy AWS services cards

into the correct slots
to complete it.

Use special cards and power ups
to protect or steal architecture slots
and learn about AWS services and solutions

by reading hints and detailed service
descriptions.

To win use your best strategy
to complete the architecture board
before your opponent gets the chance.

But watch out. Miss Gorilla
might get angry and rattle your match.
AWS Card Clash is available now on PC
